text: 13.8 2 Sto 15.6, Ais 19.2, Mat 24.8 Man awl ogɨnap tɨkjakɨl, man awl ogɨnap ayɨp penpen ñagɨnɨgabal agak. Binɨb wakay ogɨnap tɨkjakɨl, binɨb wakay ogɨnap ayɨp penpen ñagɨnɨgabal agak. Pen man okok mɨdupsek monmon dɨl, yuwan awl gɨnɨgab agak. Tap gɨnɨgab anɨb okok, bin ñapay ñɨbosup, wulep mɨdeb agɨl nepal tek nep gɨnɨgab agak.
